title: Popular physicist Stephen Hawking dies at 76
text:
Popular physicist Stephen Hawking dies at 76 Wednesday, December 31, 1969 - 01:30 
British theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking has died at the age of 76, a spokesman for his family reports. His best-selling book ''A Brief History of Time'' made him a household name, and sought to explain complex science to the masses.   
British theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking has died at the age of 76, a spokesman for his family reports. His best-selling book "A Brief History of Time" made him a household name, and sought to explain complex science to the masses.  //reut.rs/2IppqSY
